sentences.english: Because previous round the yellow card stops play, the Li Yi epicycle lifts a ban resurfaces .
sentences.chinese: 上轮因黄牌停赛，李毅本轮可谓解禁复出。

sentences.english: The 38th minute, the Banay Canada accumulates two yellow cards to punish.
sentences.chinese: 第38分钟，巴内加累积两张黄牌被罚下。

sentences.english: If it infringes the second, award a free kick and a yellow card.
sentences.chinese: 如果是第二种侵犯，处罚一个任意球和一个黄牌。

sentences.english: This service, Xisuoke lifts a ban resurfaces , but he has received a yellow card once more.
sentences.chinese: 此役，西索科解禁复出，但他再次领到了一张黄牌。

sentences.english: Will was first yellow-carded at the age of five.
sentences.chinese: 威尔在5岁的时候得到了第一张黄牌。

sentences.english: Afterward Brassey prevents in the Arab League wool, by yellow-card warning.
sentences.chinese: 随后布拉西阻挡阿毛里，被黄牌警告。

sentences.english: Mark was given a yellow card for an aggressive tackle in the first half.
sentences.chinese: 马克在上半场因为挑衅的阻截动作而被判黄牌警告。

sentences.english: Any participant who has accumulated two yellow cards will be suspended from next match automatically.
sentences.chinese: 被累积两次黄牌警告者，下场罚自动停赛一场。

sentences.english: A yellow card will be kept during the whole tournament.
sentences.chinese: 如果战队收到黄牌，将在之后所有的比赛中保留。

sentences.english: This time Warnock enters the notebook.
sentences.chinese: 这次领取黄牌的是沃诺克。

sentences.english: Behind Molina Luo pulls entrains Ma Qiao, has the yellow card.
sentences.chinese: 莫利纳罗背后拉拽马乔，吃到黄牌。

sentences.english: Halford of Beira to eat yellow card fouls.
sentences.chinese: 哈尔福德对贝拉犯规吃到黄牌。

sentences.english: Record the kick as a miss and show the kicker a yellow card.
sentences.chinese: 裁判会将此动作记为失误，并向踢球者出示黄牌警告。

sentences.english: Well, Thomas is unlucky to be booked for that.
sentences.chinese: 唉，托马斯为此而被黄牌警告真不幸。

sentences.english: Li received a second yellow card for her antics.
sentences.chinese: 李洁因为她略显滑稽的行为吃到了第二张黄牌。

sentences.english: For the Azzurri, meanwhile, one suspended player, Matteo Contini, and no cautioned players.
sentences.chinese: 那不勒斯的孔蒂尼停赛，没有球员存在黄牌停赛风险。

definition: to break the rules/an illegality/a foul
corner kick (in soccer)/free strike in hockey
(sports) to extend the duration of a game (due to stoppages)/(abbr. for 傷停補時|伤停补时[shang1 ting2 bu3 shi2]) injury time
